Kids Superhero T Shirts.title: Projector with Two-way Bluetooth, Mini Projector with Projector Screen, Full HD 1080P Portable Video Projector, Home Movie Projector Compatible with HDMI/USB/Smartphone
Kids Superhero T Shirts.deal: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
about_this_item: 【Upgraded Two-way Bluetooth 5.2 & HIFI Speaker】Built-in powerful speakers, this portable bluetooth projector provides HIFI sound effect while watching movie in a Max 200 inches screen. The updated Two-way Bluetooth function is not only supported to connect with your bluetooth speaker wirelessly, but also you can use this mini projector as a bluetooth speaker to listen music from your phone. Enlarge your happiness with our Bluetooth projector, just enjoy it!

【50% Brighter Images than Similar Projectors 】2025 Upgraded mini projector equipped with 8000:1 contrast ratio, supported 1080p resolution, brings you a 50% brighter images than similar projectors in market. It provides you with a premium home cinema experience with the bigger screen and clearer image.

【50% More Clear Images than Similar Projectors 】2025 Upgraded Chips make this movie projector more clear than other similar projectors. Our technical department researched and upgraded the chip to improve the clarity of the picture, so you can enjoy the movie everywhere and anytime.

【Low Noise & Long Lamp Life】The portable projector is lower in noise and more durable than previous models thanks to advanced fan cooling technology. Powerful cooling system cools the heat of lamp efficiently, extending the bulb life to 50,000 hours, which means you can use it more than 15 years.

【Multiple Input, Compatible with Most Devices】This home projector is fit for playing videos, TV series, photos sharing, football matches etc. It can be easily connected with laptops, smartphones, tablets, USB drives, X-Box to enjoy big games. You can enjoy movies and happyniess everywhere anytime. ★★★Please kindly note projectors with mirrored are incompatible with Hulu due to copyright issues, you can use TV Stick to play.★★★

【Smartphone Connection Instruction】 This mini phone projector can be compatible with phones and tablets, if you want to connect the phone or tablet, please prepare a HDMI adapter cable. For ios device, you need to use the official Lightning to HDMI adapter to connect your phone with projector. (HDMI adapter is not included.) For Android device, if your phone supports MHL, then you can use the micro usb/type-c to HDMI cable to connect your phone with projector. (HDMI cable is not included.) If your phone does not support MHL, you should prepare a Chrome-cast to connect your phone with projector.

Stylish youth apparel made of a soft material that is safe for your child’s skin; fashionable clothes that are outfit essentials for your little girl
Perfect for dress-up, birthday gift, every day wear, Christmas holiday gift, outdoor play and party outfit

Kids Superhero T Shirts.title: TMY Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth【100" screen included】Native 1080P Outdoor Projector, 4K Supported Portable Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/PC/TV Stick/HDMI/USB, Indoor Outdoor Use
Kids Superhero T Shirts.deal: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
about_this_item: 【Portable Projector Screen Included】Our V88 1080P Full HD projector includes a 100" projection screen that is tailored to meet our customer's needs. As opposed to other projectors, our included projector screen allows you to set up your own home theater anywhere to watch movies, TV shows, photos, slide shows, and play video games. This portable, foldable, anti-wrinkle and easy to wash 100" projection screen is larger than others, which ensures wider viewing angles and enhanced picture detail.

【Native 1080P Resolution & 4K Supported】Most of the similar projectors on the market use a 720P LCD screen, but our V88 mini projector uses a native 1080P Full HD LCD screen, which improves the projected image quality to 1920*1080 resolution. Moreover, we have adopted the technology that supports 4K video source, so that this movie projector can support 4K video at the maximum.

【Faster and Stable 5G WiFi Connection】This movie projector uses the latest 5G WiFi technology, you can mirror your iOS and Android devices with the 5G WiFi, so you can watch videos or play games smoother and more stable. Ultra-fast 5G WiFi guarantees no lagging while phone gaming and watching YouTube, hulu and Prime video. (Attention: If you want to watch videos which has copyrights, you need to connect via HDMI, fire tv stick, Roku, or Chrome-cast).

【Bluetooth 5.1 Function & Upgraded Speaker】With built-in upgraded speaker, you can enjoy a cinematic audio-visual experience without connecting external speakers. Also, this portable projector built-in Bluetooth 5.1 technology to make the audio synchronization faster and more stable. With this Bluetooth projector, you can connect your ideal Bluetooth speakers or headphones wirelessly at any time to get more wonderful sound, and you can truly create your own home theater.
【300” large screen viewing】This video projector offers a display 30"-300", 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio, and ±15° keystone correction, which is the perfect solution to your home theater or an outdoor movie.

about_this_item: [Convenient WiFi Connection] Connecting deivces with our wifi projector through wifi. We have TWO things to make it friendly user: (1) Updated the wifi connection steps, make it easier and more stable; (2) Updated the wifi connection speed, you can connect the wifi more quickly. So own our wifi projector, you can enjoy it anytime anywhere, it makes your life easier and happier.

[Two Added Bonus Better than others] (1) Higher Brightness: Our upgraded brightness is higher than others. It is much brighter than most mini projectors. (2) Add Bluetooth: It is a mini projector with wifi and bluetooth, you can hook up external speakers via bluetooth, the sound is greatly enhanced and sounded theater quality.

[Meet Your Home Needs] Watch movies, take online classes, or keep the kids entertained with hours of cartoons and educational videos [ideal for use in low-light environments]. It's the innovation of traditional projector, built-in stereo speakers, adjust keystone and focus to get 32 inch-200 inch projection size with 1.5m-5m projection distance, bring excellent spectating experience. Perfect projector for outdoor movies and movie projector for indoor use.

[Wide Compatibility and Application] Equipped with HDMI, USB, Micro SD interfaces, the projector is compatible with TV Box, TV Stick, PCs, Laptops, Tablets, USB Flash Drive, players. It’s supposed to apply many environment—Home Theater, Video Game, Party, Outdoor activities. Kids Superhero T Shirts.deal: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
about_this_item: 【Official Netflix License, Watch Shows Online】VOPLLS Smart Projector with built-in smart operating system that supports over 1,000,000+ videos, including certified Netflix, Prime Video, and YouTube. With just one click, you can quickly enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows without purchasing an additional TV stick. Besides, you can access the ""Open Browser"", ""My App"", and ""APP STORE"" for unlimited entertainment options at any time!

【Auto Focus & Keystone Correction and 180° Integrated Stand】VOPLLS projector utilizes state-of-the-art AI focusing and displacement gyroscope technology that detects in real-time and automatically corrects within 3 seconds to ensure a clear projection. Equipped with a 6D keystone correction function, it can automatically adapt to any wall and remove the restriction of placement. 180° rotatable Stand simplifies the installation and realizes the best projection effect in any scene.

【Realize Zero-Latency 2.4G/5G Dual-Band WiFi Connection】The wifi projector is equipped with a 2.4G/5G dual-band WiFi connection, so you can easily connect the projector to your cell phone or computer for instant and stable transmission. Projection is no longer delayed, or lagging, greatly improving the gaming experience and wireless projection experience, especially when playing Switch/PS4/5/X-box, etc. The outdoor projector is perfect for customers who love big-screen movies/game experiences.

【True Audio-Visual Feast, 3D Stereo Sound】 VOPLLS video projector with built-in hi-fi stereo speakers, and unique sealed core technology that effectively reduces noise by up to 80%, allow you to fully immerse yourself in the 3D stereo sound environment. The icing on the cake is that VOPLLS bluetooth projector can also connect to external speakers or use it as a standalone speaker via Bluetooth 5.2.

【480 ANSI Lumens,4K Support – Real Performance, No Exaggeration】At VOPLLS, we measure brightness strictly by the ANSI standard (ISO/IEC 21118)—because real performance matters. While others falsely claim "1200 ANSI lumens" (or even absurd 38,000 lumen numbers), their actual brightness can’t match our true 480 ANSI lumens. Combined with native 4K support, we deliver honest specs, superior visuals, and ultra-sharp detail—because true clarity starts with transparency.

【NOTE】Make sure to connect 4K devices (such as a TV stick) via HDMI to play the video. Tip: Videos labelled as 4K will be displayed at the original resolution of 1080P. As mentioned in the text, "4K supported".

Auto Focus & keystone: Wifi projector can super-fast setup in 3 seconds, so say goodbye to tedious manual adjustments.
Built-in Smart System: Smart projector with built-in Linux operating system, which is officially licensed by Netflix.
Supports 2.4/5G WiFi & Bluetooth 5.2: No delayed transmission, even during super-fast gaming content.
Eye Protection: Adopted diffused reflection with the LED light source. No infrared light or ultraviolet radiation.
Equipped with a 180° Tripod: Projector is equipped with a 180° tripod， you can adjust the angle of placement by yourself.
Advanced Cooling System: Bluetooth projector adopted high-efficiency cooling technology，and the fan noise was reduced by 80%.

Is the projector compatible with Google: Due to mirroring protocol issues of Motorola and Google phones, it prohibits screen mirroring directly from the projector. You need to have a Google Chromecast to connect it.
Can I use it for business presentation?: Office software such as PPT via USB is not supported, please connect the projector to a computer for play.
How to enter Netflix and Prime Video?: VOPLLS smart projector comes with officially-licensed Netflix and Prime Video. No need for TV stick anymore, quickly entering these Apps with just one button by remote control.
Does the projector have good sound quali: The VOPLLS video projector has built-in hi-fi stereo speakers and supports Dolby Audio, which provides detailed, stereo and stunning surround sound effects.
